name: WebCentrexPBXPortal
0:
”Alexa, launch PBX and place call to 2 3 4 5 6 7 7 8 9 0”
”Alexa, ask PBX to call Thomas”
”Alexa, ask PBX to Link”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: p. b. x.
des:
This skill will allow PBX users to place calls on the Web Centrex PBX Platform. 

A WebCentrex PBX Account is Required to use this Skill. To set up, simply say "Alexa, ask PBX to link"

Calls come from our PBX API to your Web Centrex Connected Phone.
